casebody.data:
Annie C. Sperb, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided January 29, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment in favor of plaintiff entered upon the report of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Brainard Tolles of counsel, for appellants. Edwin M. Felt, for respondent.

Before Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Dugro, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
